# Edward James Young

|death_place     = Toronto, Ontario, Canada
|profession      = farmer
|party           = Liberal
|constituency_MP = Weyburn
|parliament      = Canadian
}}
Edward James Young (January 16, 1878 â€“ October 17, 1966) was a Canadian politician and farmer. He was elected to the House of Commons of Canada in 1925 as a Member of the Liberal Party representing the riding of Weyburn. He was re-elected to Weyburn in 1926 and 1930 but defeated in 1935 by Tommy Douglas of the Co-operative Commonwealth Federation (CCF) in his first election.
He is portrayed in the 2006 CBC Television special Prairie Giant: The Tommy Douglas Story by Nicholas Campbell.
